org.parboiled
Class RecoveringParseRunner.Handler<V>

java.lang.Object
  org.parboiled.RecoveringParseRunner.Handler<V>
Type Parameters:
V - the type of the value field of a parse tree node
All Implemented Interfaces:
MatchHandler<V>
Enclosing class:
RecoveringParseRunner<V>
public static class RecoveringParseRunner.Handler<V>
extends Object
implements MatchHandler<V>

A MatchHandler implementation that recognized the three special error recovery characters Characters.DEL_ERROR, Characters.INS_ERROR and Characters.RESYNC to overcome InvalidInputErrors at the respective InputLocations.

Constructor Detail

RecoveringParseRunner.Handler

public RecoveringParseRunner.Handler(InvalidInputError<V> currentError)
Creates a new Handler. If a non-null InvalidInputError is given the handler will set its errorCharCount to the correct number if the error corresponds to an error that can only be overcome by resynchronizing.

Parameters:
currentError - an optional InvalidInputError whose errorCharCount to set during resyncing
